column2: [This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [south_slavic.GetGroupName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [magyar.GetGroupName] and [avar.GetName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [baltic.GetGroupName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [finno_ugric.GetGroupName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [bolghar.GetName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [khazar.GetName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [alan.GetName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [north_germanic.GetGroupName] people into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to integrate the [tengri_pagan.GetName] religion into a multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].

[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] united the East and West Slavic people into a single empire. [This.Founder.GetHerHisCap] descendants continued the project, successfully integrating all of the neighbouring peoples into a truly multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] managed to unite all Slavic and neighbouring people into a truly multicultural [e_lechczechrus.GetBaseName].
